meanings.definition: The quality of being pleasant or attractive
meanings.sent1: Her likabilities shone through when she greeted everyone with a warm smile.
meanings.sent2: The puppy's likabilities made it irresistible to adopt.
meanings.sent3: His likabilities were so charming that even the grumpiest person couldn't help but smile.
meanings.sent4: The likabilities of the garden were like a magnet, drawing in visitors from all around.
meanings.sent5: The likabilities of the new restaurant were so inviting that it quickly became a local favorite.

meanings.definition: The ability to be liked or appreciated by others
meanings.sent1: She possessed likabilities that made everyone want to be her friend.
meanings.sent2: His likabilities made him a popular choice for team captain.
meanings.sent3: The likabilities of the comedian had the audience laughing non-stop.
meanings.sent4: Her likabilities were like a superpower, instantly winning over anyone she met.
meanings.sent5: The likabilities of the singer were so captivating that fans traveled far and wide to see her perform.
